ai-patthana18.27:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.27:1.1_1: Gained by the teaching, not with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.27:1.1_2: go for refuge to the teaching, not for refuge.
ai-patthana18.27:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.27:2.1_0: go for refuge to the teaching, not for the sake of refuge. ...
ai-patthana18.27:3.1_0: And if consciousness does not arise because of excessive defilement,
ai-patthana18.27:4.1_0: Gailing non-defilement doesn’t give rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana18.27:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana18.27:4.1_3: (All should be expanded in this way.)
